titleStmt.title: The heads of all the proceedings in both Houses of Parliament ... concerning the great affaires of the kingdom : with some remarkable passages concerning Judge Bartlet, Sir Iohn Hotham, and the recorder.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Smith and A. Coe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library; UMI reels listed in chronological order of serial publication; scattered holdings listed.
